headline: Should You Forget Home Depot and Buy These 3 Housing-Related Stocks Instead?
summary: It's no secret that Home Depot's (NYSE: HD) prospects are guided by home improvement spending, which is led by the housing market.  As such, many investors buy into the stock to play an improving housing market in an environment of, hopefully, lower interest rates.  Here's a look at why Whirlpool (NYSE: WHR), Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE: SWK), and Owens Corning (NYSE: OC) might be better buys.
